content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
My doctor just called me and started laughing hysterically when I was making a telephone appointment with him. Am I overthinking?
sounds like you are having a hard time dealing with the situation.
He was just talking to his co worker about something else. Am I correct?
sounds like he is having a hard time with his co - worker.

situation: My doctor just called me and started laughing hysterically…
